name: History
descriptions: The History minor develops critical analysis of the past across diverse regions and time periods. Students select survey courses from at least three of six geographic categories: U.S., Europe, Latin America, Asia, Middle East, and World History.
A minimum of 6 hours must be at the 30000 level or above. Cumulative GPA of at least 2.0 required in all minor courses to graduate.

courses: Survey courses from at least three of six categories: U.S. History, Europe, Latin America, Asia, Middle East, World History - 9 hrs.

electiveCourses.description: 9 additional hours of history courses, with at least 6 total hours at the 30000 level or above.
